34.eng-name: The Book of Hunting, Slaughter, and what may be Eaten
34.ara-name: كتاب الصيد والذبائح وما يؤكل من الحيوان

hadiths.text: Ibn 'Umar reported that there were some persons with Allah's Apostle (ﷺ) from among his Companions, Sa'd being one of them. There was brought to them the flesh of the lizard when a lady amongst the wives of Allah's Apostle (ﷺ) said:It is the flesh of the lizard. Thereupon Allah's Messenger (way peace be upon him) said: Eat, for it is lawful, but it is not my diet

chapter.eng-name: The permissibility of eating the Dabb (mastigure)
